mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, title = #{title}, report = #{report}, price = #{price}, originName = #{orgName}, savedName = #{savedName}, savedPath = #{savedPath}
